Text: Customer Account s Cc Hello Debra I wanted to thank you for your quick response in providing me the acct s for Sonoco and Polaroid and I also wanted to know if you could supply me the customer account s for BICC General Cable Industries Inc Again thanks for your help Regards Vinay Adenwala

Customer Account s Cc Hello Victor My name is Vini Adenwala Im doing some research for Narsimha Misra and Richard Ring for the East Power Risk Mgmt Dept and I wanted to ask you for some information regarding our customers in Massachusetts I have a list of contracts here Polaroid Corporation Quebecor Printing USA Corp Simon Property Corp Sonoco Products Co Lucent Technologies Inc Haverhill Police Station BICC General Cable Industries Inc What I need to get from you is a customer list along w their account s for each of these contracts and Richard told me you were the person I should talk to If you could provide me with a list of the individuals responsible for billing each account or even the customer acct s themselves I would greatly appreciate it Thank you for your time and cooperation Regards Vinay Adenwala
